publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-742.1 Bill Wilson: UK Referendum on the European Reform Treaty—As an amendment to motion (S3M-742) in the name of Ted Brocklebank, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "hopes that the support that the Conservative and Unionist Party expresses for a referendum on the EU treaty will be extended to support for a referendum on independence, a referendum some 300 years overdue." Supported by: Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bashir Ahmad*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Stuart McMillan*, Brian Adam*, Sandra White*, Dave Thompson*

S3M-742.1 Bill Wilson: UK Referendum on the European Reform Treaty—As an amendment to motion (S3M-742) in the name of Ted Brocklebank, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "hopes that the support that the Conservative and Unionist Party expresses for a referendum on the EU treaty will be extended to support for a referendum on independence, a referendum some 300 years overdue." Supported by: Bob Doris, Joe FitzPatrick, Bashir Ahmad, Kenneth Gibson, Alex Neil, Stuart McMillan, Brian Adam, Sandra White, Dave Thompson
S3M-742.1 UK Referendum on the European Reform Treaty (lodged on 1 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
